dialogues.speaker: Player
dialogues.text: Hey, I heard you're going to the concert tonight. Are you excited?

dialogues.speaker: Friend
dialogues.text: Yes, I can't wait! It's going to be an amazing show. Are you coming too?

dialogues.speaker: Player
dialogues.text: Definitely! I've been looking forward to it for weeks. Do you know what time it starts?

dialogues.speaker: Friend
dialogues.text: The concert starts at 8 PM. We should meet up beforehand and grab some dinner.
